your breastmilk to begin with, it 
can be frozen and given to them 
when they are ready. When 
you go home, you can express 
milk for the nurses to give while 
you are away. There is no need 
to worry about the quantity 
or quality of your milk. Some 
mothers	find	that	providing	
breastmilk makes them feel 
that they are doing something 
very positive for their baby. See 
chapter 10 for information on 
expressing and storing milk.
Incubators
